data.name: AboutDescription
data.value: Compelling craft beer delivered cold to your door!

data.name: TermsAndConditionsBody
data.value:
Company Name: Beer Cats KK Established: October 2013 TEL: 03-5904-8949 Address: 6-10-14 A602 Otsuka, Bunkyo-ku, Tokyo, 112-0012 Managing Director: Todd Michael Stevens
Orders: Within this application, by adding products to your 'beer box' you are making an agreement to complete purchase of those items on the cutoff date.
Upon the monthly cutoff date, your box will be closed and all received orders will be finalized. We will ship your box the following day for next day delivery. However, Hokkaido, Aomori, Iwate, Akita, Chuugoku area, Shikoku, Kyushu, Okinawa, and all other islands will require two days for delivery.
Shipment methods ・Japan Post Yuupack or Sagawa will be used (cool shipping) ・Free Shipping for orders over 12,000 yen
Payment Methods ・Credit Card (VISA, MASTER, JCB, AMERICAN EXPRESS, DINERS） Upon the monthly cutoff date, your card will be automatically charged for the total. *Credit Card information is not stored on our servers
Sales Tax: Rate: 10% (Prices listed include tax)
Regarding returns: -Once your box has arrived, please check to make sure you have received your correct order. -Please let us know of any discrepancies or issues with quality within one week of delivery. -Please ship any defective or incorrect items to our office (chakubarai) for a refund or credit. -Beer Cats guarantees the quality of our products 100%
Return address: 〒170-0005 3-35-7 5F Minami-Otsuka, Toshima-ku, Tokyo Beer Cats KK
We do not sell alcohol to minors (under 20 years old).
Privacy Policy
Appropriate Collection We will only collect your personal information by appropriate and fair methods.
Type of Information We Collect The personal information we collect includes your full name, mailing address, e-mail address, and date of birth.
Purpose of Use Personal information we collect may be used for the following purposes:
Providing services on the application (hereinafter called the “app”) to customers and conducting related operations Processing of customer orders, responses to customer inquiries and complaints. Efforts to design and improve the Service customized to interests of consumers, including through sending questionnaires to customers (no personal information collected thereby will be disclosed to any third parties). Before using personal information for any purpose other than those listed above, we will notify you to request your consent, and will not use your personal information for such other purpose unless you give your consent.
If you do not wish for us to use your personal information for the purposes described in (4), (5) and (6) above, you may opt out of such uses.
Providing Information to Third Parties We will not provide your personal information to any third party without your advance consent, except where such disclosure: Is in accordance with or required by applicable law. Is necessary for the protection of the safety or property of our users or the public, and it is difficult or impractical to obtain the consent of the individual. Is necessary for public health or education and it is difficult or impractical to obtain the consent of the individual. Is made in cooperation with national or local authorities, or an individual or entity appointed by such authorities to enforce the law or carry out legal process, and in which seeking the consent of the individual could affect such enforcement or legal process. Is made pursuant to a merger, acquisition or other business combination.

data.name: NetworkDisconnected
data.value: It seems you are no longer connected to the internet. Please reconnect to continue using beerbox.

data.name: AccountProblemAccessForbidden
data.value: Looks like there was a problem updating your account. Please login again.

data.name: AccountProblemContactInformationInvalid
data.value: Please check that you've provided your complete contact information.

data.name: AccountProblemCreditCardInvalid
data.value: The credit card information provided was incomplete.

data.name: AccountProblemEmailAlreadyExists
data.value: Looks like we already have an account with that email address.

data.name: AccountProblemShippingAddressInvalid
data.value: Looks like there was a problem with the address provided, please confirm it is correct.

data.name: AccountProblemUnknownError
data.value: Sorry! looks like there was an error, please try again.

data.name: CreateAccountBirthdateTip
data.value: You must be at least 20 years old to use this service.

data.name: CreditCardNotStoredOnServer
data.value: credit card information is not stored on our servers

data.name: PaymentMethodProblemBody
data.value:
There is an issue with your payment method, "__PROBLEM__".
Please select a valid payment method or we may not be able to send your beerbox.

data.name: LoginAccountUnknown
data.value: Oops! We don't seem to know about that account. Please check your email address.

data.name: LoginProblem
data.value: Oops! We've run into a problem, please try again.

data.name: WaitVerificationExplanation1
data.value: A verification email has been sent to __EMAIL__. Please click on the link in the email to activate your account.

data.name: WaitVerificationExplanation2
data.value: Once you click the link, your account will be activated.

data.name: WaitVerificationMergeBoxDescription
data.value: We've carried the items you ordered into your new account's beerbox.

data.name: SummaryNotLoggedIn
data.value: You are currently logged out. We will keep track of the beers you select in this beerbox, but they will not be reserved and will not ship until you log in.

data.name: SummaryCostsShippingTip
data.value: Cool shipping is free for orders above ¥{0:#,0}.

data.name: OrderRecentlyClosedDescription
data.value: Your previous beerbox was closed and you now have a new empty beerbox.

data.name: OrderEndingSoonDescription
data.value: Your current beerbox will close at end of __CLOSE_DATETIME__, so make sure you add any beers you want before it closes.

data.name: OffersNoCurrent1
data.value: Hang tight while we prepare some new offers!

data.name: OffersNoCurrent2
data.value: We will notify you when we add new beers!

data.name: OfferNotLoggedInDescription
data.value: You are currently not logged in. You may add items to your beerbox, but the reservations will not be finalized until you create an account and login.

data.name: OfferQuantityLimits
data.value: This item has a limit of __MAX__ per order.

data.name: OfferInsufficientInventory
data.value: This item is popular! We were only able to add __NUMBER__ to your beerbox.

data.name: OfferNoInventory
data.value: This item was popular! Looks like we've run out of that beer.

data.name: OfferProblemAddingTitle
data.value: Oops! looks like there was an error

data.name: OfferProblemAdding
data.value: please pull down to refresh and try again

data.name: SettingsUntappdAbout1
data.value: Untappd is a free app that lets you track and rate beers you drink.

data.name: SettingsUntappdAbout2
data.value: Tap on the Untappd ratings on a beer page to open that beer in the Untappd app.

data.name: SettingsUntappdLoginTip
data.value: To turn on your Untappd ratings, you must first log in to beerbox.

data.name: ContactUsMessage
data.value: we'd love to hear your thoughts

data.name: OldVersionExplanation
data.value: You have an old version of beerbox. You will need to update to the latest version to use the app.
